titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of Rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-522, by Ms. Slaughter.

The resolution waives clause 6(a) of rule XIII (requiring a two-thirds vote to consider a rule on the same day it is reported from the Rules Committee) against certain resolutions reported from the Rules Committee. The rule applies the waiver to any resolution reported on the legislative day of Thursday, February 7, 2008, relating to a bill to provide economic stimulus.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 184.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 974, H. Res. 955 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 2/6/2008--Reported to House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendars and Committee Reports) to allow consideration on the same day it is presented to the House of any resolution reported on the legislative day of Thursday, February 7, 2008, relating to a bill to provide economic stimulus.
